comments.comment: VICTORY!
"We are flying private Jet, couse my dog is too fat.." quote of the year
CONGRATULATIONS
"We're flying private jet because my dog is too fat" has to be the most decadent thing I ever heared. I fucking love it.
is like watching an old friend, that you don't talk too often but you care a lot, moving out and reaching their dreams... is beautiful... congratulations stranger, you deserve it
We did it fam ️
"So we're flying private jet, because my dog is too fat" got me rolling in tears, poor Edgar's gonna be self-conscious
Damn.. this really felt like seeing a friend achieve his life goal... Wish you a blessed life felix
Praise be! Congrats!

"we're flying private jet, because my dog is too fat"
Not a real world sentence I imagined hearing in my life.
"We're flying a private jet because my dog is too fat" is all the motivation I need in my life going forward.

I just started bawling my eyes out the second you finally got through with the puppies!!! I couldn’t imagine the stress you went through having to deal with all of that paperwork for them! Congrats!!!!
so glad you stuck it out, and that you documented and shared it all. The private jet for Edgar was the ultimate Chad move
Leaving a phone to whatsapp call your dogs while they're in the car is the cutest thing i've seen all day
All the best! Well deserved.
I was holding back my tears, not until felix said "I'm so happy rn, we did it". I started bawling my eyes out. I'm so happy for you, for marzia, and for maya and edgar.
Ive watched Felix go from Sweden, to Italy, to England and now to Japan. Been a hell of a journey watching you over all these years.

Welcome to Japan! Congratulations on finally being able to make the move happen after all this time! 

Hope you enjoy the Combinis here.

This is legit so emotional to watch. Watching him grow from this goofy kid, screaming at a tiny little desk in his room;  to a whole grown married man moving to Japan with Mariza and the pugs. Never going to forget the old days of coming home from school, watching Amnesia and happy wheels. It's wild how fast life goes.

Wow…. From screaming at barrels with Stephano to moving to Japan with his wife. After not watching your videos for almost 6-7+ years, it’s nice seeing where your favorite YouTuber from childhood is heading in life. Congratulations!
He’s mentioned wanting to move to Japan so many times these past yrs that seeing him actually go made me pretty emotional. I’m so happy for u both. This was beautiful to see

Super Happy for you Felix and Marzia!
I haven't been to Pewd's channel for so long, But I've Been waiting for this moment.
Hoping to see Felix collab with Trash taste boys, and a "Journey across Japan" segment with Chris.
On 12:34 when pewds said "we did it" while holding back his tears, I feel genuine happiness that made me teared up. Congratulations my dude you deserved it!!
I got emotional when they finally got there. Felix seemed to get emotional too. And I'm so glad to see him happy and achieve his life goals. I grew up with him and he really deserves the best<3
"we're flying in a private jet because my dogs too fat" GOD how I love how he cares so much for his dogs.
The "I'm so happy" from Pewds sitting in the cab really got me... What a journey it's been, you guys deserve the world.
so happy to see you guys making your dreams come to fruition.  love you both ️
12:37 i think Edgar was so calm because he felt how at peace pewds was that they finally made it <3
Congrats on your move to Japan! Thanks for documenting it as well! Wish y'all the best!
Felix and Marzia playing Stardew on a private jet while their dogs sleeps peacefully besides them just makes my heart melt

いらっしゃいませ!
Glad the never ending wait is finally over mate. 
Now grab yourself some celebratory Family Mart chicken
I'm so thrilled for you and Marzia! God Bless you both!
"I'm flying private jet because my dog, is too, FAT!"  has to be one of the greatest lines
Congrats!! So nice to see you finally move in

From Happy Wheels in a tiny flat to this. Feels so surreal. What makes it more surreal is that I don't know Pewds and have nothing to do with his life but it feels like I've been with him the whole time. I hope himself and Marzia enjoy their life in Japan.

Haven't checked on you in a bit, But im so god damn proud of you pewds. I teared up a bit knowing how badly you wanted this and to finally see you achieving your dreams and moving forward with your life is insane. Hope its everything you ever wanted and you dont lose your smile :)

At the end, when they're in the car, then he takes his mask and says "we did it".. that with the emotion in his eyes was so lovely to see, esp knowing that they both wanted this for so long. Such an emotional rollarcoaster for them and all them hours was all worth it. the background music didn't help and im sure this video had many viewers teary-eyed too lol. Well and truly deserved guys, well done!
Congratulations Felix and Marzia! Hope this next chapter will be full of joy and happiness!
“It’s part of the journey, saying goodbye.” Congrats you guys, very well deserved for the both of you and the dogs

This is such a nostalgic and somber end to an era. Pewds has gone through so much over the last few years just to finally reach this point. His old setup will be missed it was like a father to me, I lived him like my child

Damn, I actually cried here. Felix made up such a big chapter in my life and him finally moving to Japan after saying it many times just feels like the end of an era or rather, I've grown up. Time flies. All the best for your future endeavour 
Edit- Wow the likes really came out of nowhere! Thank you guys!
we literally witness felix from being a teenage trying to make us happy into a grown adult trying to be happy...
WELCOME TO JAPAN! It’s awesome that you’re finally able to come here. I can’t wait to see more of your videos of your experiences in Japan. Congratulations and this is exciting. Have fun and enjoy!
ここまでして日本に移住って相当だよね。日本を好きになってくれてありがとう。日本に来てくれてありがとう。
“I’m so happy” it’s just a simple thing to say but it’s so wholesome when it comes from Felix. Congrats to you guys and I wish you have more and more happiness in your life.

Guy rented a G650 just because he wanted to ensure his dogs comfort. Literally says he cares more about his dogs comfort than his own finances since he was going to fly with the airlines. Coming from a guy in the aviation industry, this is ludicrously more expensive than flying first class with any of the airlines he showed before. I'm happy he's still so humble about it. A man that never forgot where he came from despite his well earned fortune. When you looked at Marzia and said "We did it" I felt so happy. Good job Felix! You deserve this! Happy you're living your dream life! I hope to experience that "We did it" moment with my girlfriend someday!

- From an 11 year viewer
Daamn dude, this blog really hit me in the heart,  the face you had at the end, the face of realization that you are finally getting what you wished for so long. All the best for you man
Man, hearing all these years their wish to move to Japan, and finally seeing make it, that gets the feels man. Congratz pewds and martzia. Its been a journey.
this video made me so damn emotional, congrats to you both !!

Again, we're witnessing another important moment in this man's life, we're all happy for all of you.

Much Love
The Bros.

lol Knowing how frugal Felix usually is, seeing him splurg on a private flight just for the sake of Maya and Edgar was both cathartic and goofy as I could imagine! Glad Felix and Marzia are happy with the move!
Congrats Felix and Marzia! I’m so happy for y’all. Literally started tearing up when y’all finally made it through.

So glad to finally hear you’ve made it over here ️ It’s been a long time coming 🇯🇵 welcome to Japan 
ようこそ日本へ🇯🇵
“Flying private jet because my dog is too fat” best quote

“We’re flying private jet, because my dog is too fat” I WHEEZED at that  
Congrats on finally making it to Japan! So happy for you both!
I felt so many emotions when Felix said “we did it” and showed his face afterwards ️

Time really flies, I remember when you moved to Italy to be with Marzia, when yous went to Brighton for the first time on holiday, moving to Brighton, getting Edgar, Maya meeting Edgar for the first time after travelling from Italy, Billy and Clint, Slippy, Doggy, you and Marzia getting engaged in Japan, your wedding and now finally your dream move to Japan...I feel like I’ve been there for it all and I couldn’t be prouder or happier for you both. Good luck on your new adventure ️ * holding my thumbs *

It really feels like we grew up with Felix. We were there when him and Marzia just started dating, to getting engage, to getting married, to moving to a whole different country together. I never knew I could feel so proud of someone who I never met.
This one hit close home. Great stuff pewds congrats on moving!
12 years watching and I still get exited for that brofist I'm a freaking dentist now ffs. I hope my kids get to watch you too
It’s crazy to think I started watching him from a tiny kitchen and scaring himself every night to living his entire dream I love this man

Being from the UK myself it's sad to see you leave, especially when the silly little "Wouldn't it be funny if we saw Pewds" down in Brighton. Many congrats for making it to Japan! A new chapter awaits.
From dropping out and selling hot dogs to moving to his dream location and taking a private jet just so he could take their dogs with them. What a journey! So much inspiration. Congratulations

I don't know why, but watching this video felt like a movie, even though it was 14 minutes long. You stick it out through covid, and every hurdle that came in your way you got over, and seeing how happy you, Mariza, and the dogs are in the end fills me with so much joy. Congratulations Felix, Marzia, Maya, and Edgar on your move and your new life! Amazing video!
I felt that "I’m so happy". The eyes don’t deceive, felt the relief as well. Congrats Felix!
i can’t believe growing up with this pewds and seeing him accomplish his dreams made me cry lol
Finally dream come true! Congrats Felix and Marzia. Wish you all the best in Japan
Those flash of tears and that voice break at 6:57…

12:23 Pewds: "I'm so happy". 
Here's where I couldn't hold in the tears anymore, DAAMN felt like he could finally release all the stress and tension and relax for the first time! Super happy for you both and so glad everything worked out! <3
Riktigt inspiration äru, lycka till i Japan nu! (Viking language).
Finally it happened  so happy for you!! Congrats
Congrats Felix and Marzia! Im glad everything worked out well and you have finally achieved your dreams!
You're like a brother to many of us even if we actually never met, and we feel genuine relief from seeing you so happy and full. Wish you, Marzia and puggos the best in Japan <3

"I'm so happy" and "We did it" with Felix's reaction really warmed my heart.
Hope all the best for you.
Welcome to Japan! Happy you could make your dream come true! Enjoy the next adventure!
That felt very natural and joyful to watch, peace and blessings to you and your loved ones.
Finally getting to see Pewd's and Marzia's journey since the beginning, and now a new chapter is about to happen. Will keep being there for you two
Really glad to see you guys are able to finally move to Japan. It’s been a huge process and it finally happened. Congrats!
PewDiePieさん!! welcome to Japan! 日本へようこそ！楽しんで下さい🇯🇵
What makes this so good is all the hard works and struggle. The more we meme'd pewdiepie can't go to japan, the happier we get when finally it's happening. Congrats!!!!

I know I'm a bit late, but I've been watching you since 2011, have heard you talk about moving to Japan quite a few times before, it feels unreal to see you doing it, and I can't imagine how much more unreal it must feel to be doing it. congratulations to you and Marzia both, I hope you guys are happy there!

I remember watching pewds when he was in a small flat screaming at terrible horror games and now he is here fulfilling his dreams, thank you for taking us with you on your journey pewds, and thank you for keeping smiles on our faces, wish you the best!
CONGRATS YOU GUYS! ALL THE BEST!

started crying at the brofist. instantly transported into a 9 year old again, doing the brofist after an amnesia video I'm so excited for him. Felix never fails to make me emotional with a deep nostalgia

I've never been what one would consider a "fan" of pewdiepie.
I never had anything against him, his way of creating content just never appealed to me.
But this video brings me a form of joy I don't know how to explain.
I wish Felix all the best in his life and whatever he does next.
Man if it's this hard for a millionaire like pewds to move abroad with two pugs then I have no hope with two huskies.
This is awesome man, I lived in Japan for two years and I can’t wait to go back one day. Very happy for you and excited to see what comes next for you guys in this chapter!

“Edgar is too fat, so we’re taking a private jet” lmao. Congratulations to you four. I cried because I can just imagine the relief of receiving what you’ve been waiting and fighting for after so long️
felix i’m so happy for you!! i also was able to finally move to japan and now i’ve been here for almost 2 months! it was a long fucking wait but we made it
I felt that “I’m so happy”. Eyes don’t deceive, I could see the relief. Congrats to you guys

when Pewds said “we did it”, damn, that brought a tear to my eyes. Can’t believe I’ve been watching pewds for nearly a decade now, sometimes I feel like I’ve grown up with both Felix and Marzia, almost like they were actual friends of mine. Love these two amazing human beings.
So pleased for you guys! The look of happiness and relief was so evident on your face!
I never thought I would say this since I don’t usually watch his videos, but that just became one of my favorites videos in YouTube. It brought me so much joy for him, beautifully captured
feels surreal that you guys finally made your dream a reality. So happy for both of you ️
Congrats man, glad to see the dream coming true. It's been a long journey. Enjoy all of the epic Japanese food for me.

There's just something so heartwarming and wholesome about seeing good things happen to good people.

Congratulations to you both.
Yes you two did the right thing. Dogs are family. They are important. Glad the journey was ok.
This was really nice to watch. Thanks for documenting it and congrats on the big move.
I swear i got emotional when you straight up said: " I am so happy". I am truly so happy for you, Marzia Edgar and Maya. Hope you read this️
12:30 That car ride made me shed a tear. Proved you can reach any goal you have, no matter how impossible it may seem/feel. Good shit Pewds :)

I started watching you when I was 10 years old right after my dad passed away and you brought so much joy Everytime you posted I just randomly thought of you today because i thought “ didn’t pewdiepie have the 50 million followers” and now your at 111 million!!! And haven’t aged at all I’m 21 now it’s just so crazy how fast time flies I’m so glad to see him again so happy and I’m  excited to rewatch him
